formattedAddress: 1244 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1244 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Newgard is a true expert.  She's a perfectionist which is exactly what I want in a dentist.

text.text: Dr. Newgard is a true expert.  She's a perfectionist which is exactly what I want in a dentist.

originalText.text:
I have seen Dr. Newgard twice.  She helped me replace a cracked tooth quickly and safely during the beginning of the pandemic.

More recently, I saw Dr. Newgard because I have have soft tissue damage that needs specialized treatment.  She gave me an excellent referral but did not stop there.  She quickly communicated with the specialist I would be seeing, sent him photos of my issue, and gave me clear  instructions for interim care.  She took time to help me schedule the new appointment to save me a few minutes of trouble.  She was very kind and efficient and seems like a very thoughtful person.  Best dentist I have encountered so far.

originalText.text: I really appreciate Dr. Neugard's care.  She explains everything clearly, provides options, and is completely unflappable.  Exactly what you want in a dentist.

text.text: I really appreciate Dr. Neugard's care.  She explains everything clearly, provides options, and is completely unflappable.  Exactly what you want in a dentist.

originalText.text: Dr Newgard is amazing. Everyone in our family sees her and I cannot recommend her more highly. Careful, compassionate, informative, and professional.

text.text: Dr Newgard is amazing. Everyone in our family sees her and I cannot recommend her more highly. Careful, compassionate, informative, and professional.

originalText.text: Dr. Newgard is a very caring dentist with a good gentle approach.
